Sapos yumi bihainim dispela tupela lo, orait dispela pasin em i winim olgeta ofa ol i save kukim olgeta long paia, na i winim olgeta kain ofa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Jesus saw that he answered wisely, he said to him,

block.text: Jisas i harim dispela man i bekim tok olsem man I gat gutpela save, na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are not far from the Kingdom of God.”

block.text: "Yu no i stap longwe long kingdom bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one dared ask him any question after that.

block.text: Na olgeta man i pret long askim Jisas long wanpela samting moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus responded, as he taught in the temple,

block.text: Jisas i stap insait long banis bilong tempel na em i wok long givim tok long ol manmeri. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How is it that the scribes say that the Christ is the son of David?

block.text: "Olsem wanem na ol save-man bilong lo i save tok olsem, man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol man-meri bilong en, em i pikinini bilong Devit?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For David himself said in the Holy Spirit, ‘The Lord said to my Lord, “Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies the footstool of your feet.” ’

block.text: Holi Spirit i givim tingting long Devit, na Devit yet i tok, `Bikpela i tokim Bikpela bilong mi olsem, "Yu sindaun long han sut bilong mi inap mi putim ol birua bilong yu i stap aninit long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore David himself calls him Lord, so how can he be his son?”

block.text: Devit yet i kolim dispela man Bikpela bilong em. Orait olsem wanem na dispela man em i pikinini bilong Devit? "

ReferenceBlocks.text: The common people heard him gladly.

block.text: Bikpela lain manmeri i stap, na ol i amamas tru long harim tok bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In his teaching he said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i skulim ol, na em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Beware of the scribes. They like to walk around in long robes, and to get greetings in the marketplaces.

block.text: "Yupela lukaut long ol saveman bilong lo. Ol i save laikim tumas long putim longpela klos na wokabaut i go. Ol i laikim tumas long ol manmeri i mas givim gude long ol long ol ples bung.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They choose the best seats in the synagogues, and the best places at feasts.

block.text: Ol i laikim tumas long kisim ol namba wan ples bilong sindaun long ol haus lotu, na ol i save laik long kisim ol namba wan sia long ol bikpela kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They devour widows’ houses, and for a pretense make long prayers. They will receive the greater damnation.”

block.text: Ol i save trikim ol meri, man bilong ol i dai pinis, na stilim ol haus bilong ol. Na ol i save giaman long mekim ol longpela prea. Long taim bilong kot ol bai i kisim bikpela hevi moa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus sat down opposite the treasury, and saw how the multitude cast money into the treasury. Many who were rich cast in much.

block.text: Jisas i sindaun klostu long bokis mani bilong tempel. Na em i lukim ol manmeri i kam putim ol ofa long bokis. Na planti maniman i putim planti mani.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A poor widow came, and she cast in two small copper coins, which equal a penny.

block.text: Na wanpela rabismeri, man bilong en i dai pinis, em i kam na i tromoi tupela liklik mani, inap olsem wan toea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He called his disciples to himself, and said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i singautim ol disaipel bilong en i kam, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, this poor widow gave more than all those who are giving into the treasury.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, dispela rabismeri, man bilong en i dai pinis, em i givim bikpela mani moa, i winim olgeta mani ol arapela manmeri i bin putim long bokis mani bilong tempel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all gave out of their abundance, but she, out of her poverty, gave all that she had to live on.”

block.text: Dispela olgeta manmeri ol i gat planti mani i stap, na ol i tromoi hap tasol i go long bokis. Tasol dispela meri em i sot tru, na em i tromoi olgeta mani bilong en. Em i no gat mani moa i stap bilong baim kaikai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MARK CHP 13
As he went out of the temple, one of his disciples said to him,

block.text: Jisas i lusim banis bilong tempel na i wokabaut i go, na wanpela disaipel bilong en i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, see what kind of stones and what kind of buildings!”

block.text: "Tisa, lukim ol dispela naispela bikpela ston na ol gutpela gutpela haus!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you see these great buildings? There will not be left here one stone on another, which will not be thrown down.”

block.text: "Yu lukim ol dispela bikpela haus, a? Ol bai i no larim wanpela ston i stap antap long narapela ston. Nogat. Ol bai i brukim olgeta na tromoi i go daun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As he sat on the Mount of Olives opposite the temple, Peter, James, John, and Andrew asked him privately,

block.text: Jisas i sindaun long maunten Oliv na i lukim tempel i stap long hap. Na Pita na Jems na Jon na Andru tasol ol i kam long em. Na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell us, when will these things be? What is the sign that these things are all about to be fulfilled?”

block.text: "Yu tokim mipela, wanem taim ol dispela samting bai i kamap? Wanem mak bai i kamap pastaim, na mipela i ken save, ol dispela samting klostu i laik kamap?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, answering, began to tell them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be careful that no one leads you astray.

block.text: "Yupela lukaut. Nogut wanpela man i giamanim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For many will come in my name, saying, ‘I am Christ!’ and will lead many astray.”

block.text: Planti man bai i kam na kolim nem bilong mi na tok, 'Mi yet mi dispela man.' Na bai ol i giamanim planti manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When you hear of wars and rumors of wars, don't be troubled. For those must happen, but the end is not yet.

block.text: "Na bihain, taim yupela i harim nois bilong ol bikpela pait, na taim yupela i harim tok win long ol bikpela pait i kamap long sampela hap, orait yupela i no ken kirap nogut. Ol dispela samting i mas kamap, tasol las de i no yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom. There will be earthquakes in various places. There will be famines and troubles. These things are the beginning of birth pains.

block.text: Ol man bilong sampela lain bai i kirapim pait long ol narapela narapela lain. Na ol lain bilong sampela king bai i kirapim pait long ol lain bilong ol narapela narapela king. Long sampela hap bai graun i guria, na bai ol i gat taim bilong bikpela hangre. Dispela ol samting em i olsem pen i save kamap pastaim long meri i laik karim pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But watch yourselves, for they will deliver you up to councils. You will be beaten in synagogues. You will stand before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony to them.

block.text: "Long dispela taim yupela yet i mas lukaut gut. Ol bai i kotim yupela long ol kaunsil bilong ol. Na ol bai i paitim yupela insait long ol haus lotu. Ol bai i ting long daunim nem bilong mi, na ol bai i sanapim yupela long pes bilong ol gavman na ol king. Olsem na bai yupela i ken autim gutnius long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Good News must first be preached to all the nations.

block.text: Olgeta lain man i mas harim man i autim gutnius pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they lead you away and deliver you up, don't be anxious beforehand, or premeditate what you will say, but say whatever will be given you in that hour. For it is not you who speak, but the Holy Spirit.”

block.text: Na taim ol i pasim yupela na bringim yupela i go long kot, yupela i no ken pret na ting, 'Mipela bai i mekim wanem tok?' Nogat. Olgeta tok God bai i givim long yupela long dispela taim stret, em yupela i mas autim. Long wanem, i no yupela yet bai i autim tok. Nogat. Holi Spirit em bai i autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Brother will deliver up brother to death, and the father his child. Children will rise up against parents, and cause them to be put to death.

block.text: Man bai i kotim ol brata bilong en na tokim ol man long kilim ol dispela brata i dai. Na ol papa bai i mekim wankain pasin long ol pikinini bilong ol. Na ol pikinini bai i birua long papamama bilong ol na tokim ol man long kilim ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will be hated by all men for my name's sake, but he who endures to the end, the same will be saved.

block.text: Na olgeta man bai i bel nogut tru long yupela, long wanem, nem bilong mi em i stap long yupela. Tasol ol manmeri i stap strong inap long las de, God bai i kisim bek ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when you see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, standing where it ought not (let the reader understand), then let those who are in Judea flee to the mountains.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela bai i lukim samting nogut tru i sanap i stap long ples i tambu long en." Man i ritim dispela tok em i mas tingim gut. "Na long dispela taim ol manmeri i stap long distrik Judia ol i mas ranawe i go long ples maunten.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let him who is on the housetop not go down, nor enter in, to take anything out of his house.

block.text: Na sapos man i stap antap long haus, orait taim em i go daun em i no ken i go insait long haus bilong kisim ol samting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let him who is in the field not return back to take his cloak.

block.text: Na man i stap long gaden, em i no ken i go bek long haus bilong kisim longpela klos bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But woe to those who are with child and to those who nurse babies in those days!

block.text: Sori tumas long ol meri i gat bel na ol meri i givim susu long ol pikinini long dispela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pray that your flight won't be in the winter.

block.text: Na yupela i mas beten, bai ol dispela samting i no ken kamap long taim bilong kol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in those days there will be oppression, such as there has not been the like from the beginning of the creation which God created until now, and never will be.

block.text: Long dispela taim bai i gat bikpela hevi tru. Stat long taim God i wokim olgeta samting na i kam inap long nau, kain hevi olsem i no bin kamap bipo. Na bihain tu bai i no gat kain hevi olsem i kamap gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Unless the Lord had shortened the days, no flesh would have been saved; but for the sake of the chosen ones, whom he picked out, he shortened the days.

block.text: Na sapos Bikpela i no bin sotim taim bilong ol dispela hevi, orait olgeta manmeri bai i lus. Tasol em i tingting long ol manmeri em i makim pinis bilong em yet. Olsem na em i sotim dispela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then if anyone tells you, ‘Look, here is the Christ!’ or, ‘Look, there!’ don't believe it.

block.text: "Long dispela taim, sapos wanpela man i tokim yupela, 'Lukim, man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i stap hia,' o 'Lukim, em i stap long hap,' yupela i no ken bilip long tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there will arise false christs and false prophets, and will show signs and wonders, that they may lead astray, if possible, even the chosen ones.

block.text: Sampela man bai i kam na tok giaman olsem, 'Mi dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en' o 'Mi wanpela profet,' na bai ol i wokim ol mirakel na mekim ol narakain narakain samting i kamap. Tru tumas, sapos ol inap, ol bai i paulim ol manmeri God i makim bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you watch. Behold, I have told you all things beforehand.

block.text: Olsem na yupela lukaut. Mi tokim yupela pinis long olgeta samting bai i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But in those days, after that oppression, the sun will be darkened, the moon will not give its light,

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Taim bilong ol dispela bikpela hevi i pinis, orait long dispela taim san bai i kamap tudak, na mun bai i no moa lait,

ReferenceBlocks.text: the stars will be falling from the sky, and the powers that are in the heavens will be shaken.

block.text: na ol sta bai i lusim skai na pundaun, na ol strongpela samting bilong skai bai i guria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they will see the Son of Man coming in clouds with great power and glory.

block.text: Na long dispela taim ol manmeri bai i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i stap long ol klaut na i kam wantaim bikpela strong na bikpela lait bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he will send out his angels, and will gather together his chosen ones from the four winds, from the ends of the earth to the ends of the sky.”

block.text: Na long dispela taim em bai i salim ol ensel bilong en i go, na em bai i bungim ol manmeri em i bin makim bilong em yet. Em bai i kisim ol long olgeta hap, i go olgeta long arere tru bilong graun wantaim skai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now from the fig tree, learn this parable. When the branch has now become tender, and puts forth its leaves, you know that the summer is near.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Yupela i ken kisim save long diwai fik. Taim han bilong en i gat wara na ol nupela lip i kamap, yupela i save, taim bilong gutpela san i laik kamap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so you also, when you see these things coming to pass, know that it is near, at the doors.

block.text: Olsem tasol, taim yupela i lukim ol dispela samting i kamap, yupela i ken save, Pikinini Bilong Man i kam klostu pinis, na i stap long dua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I say to you, this generation will not pass away until all these things happen.

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, taim ol manmeri bilong dispela taim i no i dai yet, dispela olgeta samting bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will not pass away.

block.text: Skai wantaim graun bai i lus, tasol tok bilong mi bai i no inap lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But of that day or that hour no one knows, not even the angels in heaven, nor the Son, but only the Father.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Tasol i no gat wanpela man i save wanem de na wanem aua dispela ol samting bai i kamap. Ol ensel bilong heven i no save, na Pikinini tu em i no save. Papa wanpela tasol em i save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch, keep alert, and pray; for you don't know when the time is.”

block.text: "Yupela lukaut. Yupela i mas was i stap, long wanem, yupela i no save wanem taim dispela ol samting bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is like a man, traveling to another country, having left his house, and given authority to his servants, and to each one his work, and also commanded the doorkeeper to keep watch.

block.text: Em i olsem wanpela man i lusim haus bilong en na i go wokabaut long narapela hap. Em i tokim ol wokboi long bosim ol samting, na em i tilim wok long ol wan wan. Na em i tokim man i save was long dua long em i mas was gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch therefore, for you don't know when the lord of the house is coming, whether at evening, or at midnight, or when the rooster crows, or in the morning;

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas was gut. Yupela i no save wanem taim papa bilong haus bai i kam. Bai em i kam long apinun o long biknait o long taim kakaruk i krai o long moningtaim, em yupela i no save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: lest coming suddenly he might find you sleeping.

block.text: Nogut em i kam wantu tasol na i lukim yupela i slip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What I tell you, I tell all: Watch.”

block.text: Dispela tok mi givim long yupela, em mi givim long olgeta manmeri. Yupela i mas was i stap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: MARK CHP 14
It was now two days before the feast of the Passover and the unleavened bread, and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might seize him by deception, and kill him.
For they said,

block.text: Bihain long tupela de Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut, na Ol Bikpela De Bilong Bret I No Gat Yis, ol bai i kamap. Na ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo ol i tok, "Olsem wanem na yumi ken giamanim Jisas na holimpas em na kilim em i dai?"
Ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not during the feast, because there might be a riot of the people.”

block.text: "Yumi no ken mekim dispela samting long ol bikpela de bilong lotu. Nogut ol manmeri i lukim na ol i kros na kirapim pait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: While he was at Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper, as he sat at the table, a woman came having an alabaster jar of ointment of pure nard--very costly. She broke the jar, and poured it over his head.

block.text: Jisas i stap long ples Betani long haus bilong Saimon, em wanpela man bipo i bin i gat sik lepra. Em i sindaun long tebol, na wanpela meri i kam. Dispela meri i karim wanpela naispela botol ston i gat nambawan sanda, em i dia tumas. Na em i brukim dispela botol na i kapsaitim sanda long het bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But there were some who were indignant among themselves, saying,

block.text: Tasol sampela man i stap, ol i lukim na ol i bel nogut. Na ol i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why has this ointment been wasted?

block.text: "Bilong wanem em i pinisim nating dispela sanda?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this might have been sold for more than three hundred denarii, and given to the poor.”

block.text: Sapos yumi bin larim ol man i baim, bai yumi inap kisim samting olsem 300 mani silva long en na givim long ol rabisman."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They grumbled against her.
But Jesus said,

block.text: Na ol i krosim dispela meri.
Tasol Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Leave her alone. Why do you trouble her? She has done a good work for me.

block.text: "Yupela larim dispela meri. Watpo yupela i givim hevi long en? Em i bin mekim gutpela pasin tru long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you always have the poor with you, and whenever you want to, you can do them good; but you will not always have me.

block.text: Oltaim ol rabisman bai i stap wantaim yupela. Wanem taim yupela i gat laik long helpim ol, orait yupela i ken helpim ol. Tasol mi, bai mi no inap i stap wantaim yupela oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She has done what she could. She has anointed my body beforehand for the burying.

block.text: Samting dispela meri inap mekim, em i mekim pinis. Em i putim sanda long bodi bilong mi bilong redim bodi bilong mi long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, wherever this Good News may be preached throughout the whole world, that which this woman has done will also be spoken of for a memorial of her.”

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, long olgeta hap graun ol i go long en na autim gutnius, ol bai i toktok tu long samting dispela meri i bin mekim, na ol bai i tingting long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judas Iscariot, who was one of the twelve, went to the chief priests and said:

block.text: Long dispela taim wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, em Judas Iskariot, em i go long ol bikpris.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will hand him over to you.”

block.text: Em i laik givim Jisas long han bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they heard this they rejoiced and said:

block.text: Ol i harim dispela na ol i amamas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We will pay you for this!”

block.text: Na ol i promis long givim sampela mani long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He began looking for a convenient time to betray Jesus.

block.text: Na Judas i stat long painim rot bilong givim Jisas long han bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the first day of unleavened bread, when they sacrificed the Passover, his disciples asked him,

block.text: Namba wan de bilong Ol Bikpela De Bilong Bret I No Gat Yis em i kamap. Long dispela de ol i save kilim pikinini sipsip bilong kaikai long Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut. Na ol disaipel i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where do you want us to go and prepare that you may eat the Passover?”

block.text: "Yu laik bai mipela i go redim ol samting we na bai yu mekim bikpela kaikai?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He sent two of his disciples, and said to them,

block.text: Orait Jisas i salim tupela disaipel i go, na i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go into the city, and there you will meet a man carrying a pitcher of water. Follow him.

block.text: "Yutupela go insait long taun. Na wanpela man i karim bikpela sospen wara bai i bungim yutupela long rot. Yutupela i mas bihainim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Wherever he enters in, tell the master of the house, ‘The Teacher says, “Where is the guest room, where I may eat the Passover with my disciples?”’

block.text: Taim yutupela i lukim em i go insait long wanpela haus, yutupela i mas tokim papa bilong dispela haus olsem, 'Tisa i tok, "Rum bilong mi i stap we na mi wantaim ol disaipel bilong mi mipela i ken kaikai dispela kaikai bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut?'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will himself show you a large upper room furnished and ready. Get ready for us there.”

block.text: Na em bai i soim yutupela wanpela bikpela rum i stap antap, em i gat tebol na sia samting na i redi pinis. Yutupela redim kaikai bilong yumi long dispela rum."

ReferenceBlocks.text: His disciples went out, and came into the city, and found things as he had said to them, and they prepared the Passover.

block.text: Orait tupela disaipel i go. Tupela i kamap long taun, na tupela i lukim olgeta samting i stap olsem Jisas i bin tokim tupela. Na tupela i redim kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When it was evening he came with the twelve.
As they sat and were eating, Jesus said,

block.text: Long apinun Jisas em i kam wantaim ol 12 -pela disaipel.
Ol i sindaun long tebol na ol i kaikai i stap, na Jisas i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, one of you will betray me--he who eats with me.”

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, wanpela man namel long yupela bai i givim mi long han bilong ol man i birua long mi. Em wanpela man i kaikai wantaim mi nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They began to be sorrowful, and to ask him one by one,

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i bel hevi, na ol wan wan i stat long askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Surely not I?”

block.text: "Ating yu tok long mi, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered them,

block.text: Jisas i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is one of the twelve, he who dips with me in the dish.

block.text: "Dispela man em wanpela namel long yupela 12 -pela. Em wanpela man i bin kisim bret na putim insait long dis wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Son of Man goes, even as it is written about him, but woe to that man by whom the Son of Man is betrayed! It would be better for that man if he had not been born.”

block.text: Tru, Pikinini Bilong Man bai i dai, olsem buk bilong God i tok pinis long em i mas i dai. Tasol sori tumas long dispela man i givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol birua. Mobeta mama i no bin karim dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they were eating, Jesus took bread, and when he had blessed, he broke it, and gave to them, and said,

block.text: Ol i kaikai I stap, na Jisas i kisim wanpela bret, na i tenkyu long God, na i brukim, na i givim long ol disaipel. Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take and eat. This is my body.”

block.text: "Yupela kisim. Dispela em i bodi bilong mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave to them. They all drank of it.
He said to them,

block.text: Na em i kisim wanpela kap wain, na i tenkyu long God, na i givim long ol. Na olgeta ol i dring long en.
Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is my blood of the new covenant, which is poured out for many.

block.text: "Dispela em i blut bilong mi bilong mekimkontrak. Mi kapsaitim bilong helpim planti manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, I will no more drink of the fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it anew in the Kingdom of God.”

block.text: Mi tok tru long yupela, mi no ken dring wain moa inap long taim mi dringim nupela wain insait long kingdom bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had sung a hymn, they went out to the Mount of Olives.
Jesus said to them,

block.text: Orait ol i singim wanpela song, na ol i lusim taun na i go long maunten Oliv.
Jisas I tokim ol disaipel bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All of you will be made to stumble because of me tonight, for it is written, ‘I will strike the shepherd, and the sheep will be scattered.’

block.text: "Bilip bilong yupela olgeta bai i pundaun, long wanem, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Mi kilim wasman, na bai ol sipsip i ranawe i go nabaut.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, after I am raised up, I will go before you into Galilee.”

block.text: Tasol bai mi kirap bek, na bai mi go paslain long yupela long Galili."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter said to him,

block.text: Pita i tokim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Although all will be offended, yet I will not.”

block.text: "Maski sapos bilip bilong olgeta arapela man i pundaun na ol i lusim yu, mi bai i no inap lusim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, that you today, even this night, before the rooster crows twice, you will deny me three times.”

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yu, nau long dispela nait, taim kakaruk i no krai tupela taim yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he spoke all the more,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok strong moa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I must die with you, I will not deny you.”

block.text: "Maski sapos mi mas i dai wantaim yu, mi no inap tok olsem mi no save long yu. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all said the same thing.

block.text: Na olgeta disaipel ol i mekim wankain tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They came to a place which was named Gethsemane. He said to his disciples,

block.text: Jisas wantaim ol disaipel i go kamap long wanpela hap ol i kolim Getsemani. Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sit here, while I pray.”

block.text: "Yupela sindaun i stap hia. Mi laik beten."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took with him Peter, James, and John, and began to be greatly troubled and distressed.
He said to them,

block.text: Na em i kisim Pita na Jems na Jon, na ol i go wantaim em. Nau bel bilong en i pas, na em i pilim nogut tru.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My soul is exceedingly sorrowful, even to death. Stay here, and watch.”

block.text: "Bel bilong mi em i hevi tumas, na klostu mi laik i dai. Yupela stap hia na was gut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass away from him.
He said,

block.text: Na em i go liklik, na em i pundaun long graun, na em i prea. Sapos i gat rot, em i laik bai dispela taim nogut i abrusim em.
Em i beten olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Abba, Father, all things are possible to you. Please remove this cup from me. However, not what I desire, but what you desire.”

block.text: "Aba, Papa, yu inap long mekim olgeta samting. Mi laik bai yu rausim dispela kap long mi. Tasol yu no ken bihainim laik bilong mi. Nogat. Yu mas bihainim laik bilong yu tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came and found them sleeping, and said to Peter,

block.text: Na Jisas i go long ol tripela disaipel, na em i lukim ol i slip i stap. Na em i askim Pita olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Simon, are you sleeping? Couldn't you watch one hour?

block.text: "Saimon, yu slip, a? Yu no inap was inap long wan aua, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch and pray, that you may not enter into temptation. The spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.”

block.text: Yupela i mas was na prea i stap. Nogut traim i kamap long yupela na yupela i pundaun. Tru, bel em i gat laik bilong mekim samting, tasol bodi em i no gat strong."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he went away, and prayed, saying the same words.

block.text: Na Jisas i go gen na i mekim wankain prea olsem em i bin mekim pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again he returned, and found them sleeping, for their eyes were very heavy, and they didn't know what to answer him.

block.text: Na em i kam gen long ol disaipel na i lukim ol i slip i stap, long wanem, ai bilong ol i hevi tru. Na taim em i kirapim ol, ol i no save, bai ol i mekim wanem tok long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came the third time, and said to them,

block.text: Bihain Jisas i kam bek namba 3 taim, na em i tokim ol disaipel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Sleep now and take your rest. It is enough. The hour has come. Behold, the Son of Man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.

block.text: "Yupela i slip yet na malolo, a? Em inap. Taim i kamap pinis, na nau ol i givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol man bilong mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Arise, let us be going. Behold, he who betrays me is at hand.”

block.text: Yupela kirap, na yumi go. Lukim, man i laik givim mi long han bilong ol, em i kamap pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately, while he was still speaking, Judas, one of the twelve, came--and with him a multitude with swords and clubs, from the chief priests, the scribes, and the elders.

block.text: Jisas i toktok yet i stap, na wantu Judas, em wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, em i kam. Bikpela lain man i kam wantaim em, na ol i holim ol bainat na stik. Ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo na ol hetman ol i salim ol i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he who betrayed him had given them a sign, saying,

block.text: Dispela man i laik givim Jisas long han bilong ol, em i bin tokim ol long wanpela mak olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whomever I will kiss, that is him. Seize him, and lead him away safely.”

block.text: "Bai mi givim kis long wanpela man. Dispela man em Jisas. Yupela holimpas em, na was gut long em, na kisim em i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had come, immediately he came to him, and said,

block.text: Orait Judas em i kamap na i go long Jisas kwiktaim, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rabbi! Rabbi!”

block.text: "Tisa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and kissed him.
They laid their hands on him, and seized him.

block.text: Na em i givim kis long em.
Na ol i putim han long Jisas na holimpas em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But a certain one of those who stood by drew his sword, and struck the servant of the high priest, and
cut off his ear.
Jesus answered them,

block.text: Wanpela bilong ol man i sanap klostu, em i pulim bainat bilong en na i paitim wokboi bilong hetpris, na bainat i
katim yau bilong en na yau i pundaun.
Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you come out, as against a robber, with swords and clubs to seize me?

block.text: "Yupela i kisim ol bainat na stik na yupela i kam bilong holimpas mi, olsem yupela i laik holimpas wanpela man bilong pait na stil, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and you didn't arrest me. But this is so that the Scriptures might be fulfilled.”

block.text: Olgeta de mi bin i stap wantaim yupela insait long banis bilong tempel na mi skulim ol manmeri. Yupela i no laik holimpas mi long dispela taim? Tasol maski. Tok i stap long buk bilong God i mas kamap tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all left him, and fled.

block.text: Na olgeta disaipel i lusim Jisas na ol i ranawe.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A certain young man followed him, having a linen cloth thrown around himself, over his naked body. The young men grabbed him,

block.text: Wanpela yangpela man i bin bihainim Jisas i kam, na em i pasim wanpela waitpela laplap tasol long bodi bilong en. Na ol i holimpas em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: but he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.

block.text: tasol em i lusim waitpela laplap na i ranawe as nating tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They led Jesus away to the high priest. All the chief priests, the elders, and the scribes came together with him.

block.text: Ol man i bin holimpas Jisas ol i bringim em i go long haus bilong hetpris. Na olgeta bikpris na hetman na saveman bilong lo ol i bung i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter had followed him from a distance, until he came into the court of the high priest. He was sitting with the officers, and warming himself in the light of the fire.

block.text: Pita i bihainim Jisas i go, tasol em i stap longwe liklik. Em i go insait long banis bilong haus bilong hetpris. Na em i sindaun wantaim ol plisman na i hatim skin bilong en long paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the chief priests and the whole council sought witnesses against Jesus to put him to death, and found none.

block.text: Ol bikpris wantaim olgeta kaunsil ol i singautim sampela man i kam autim tok long ol pasin Jisas i bin mekim. Ol i laik painim wanpela rong em i bin mekim inap long ol i ken kilim em i dai, tasol ol i no inap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For many gave false testimony against him, and their testimony didn't agree with each other.

block.text: Planti man i sutim tok giaman long em, tasol tok bilong ol i no wankain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some stood up, and gave false testimony against him, saying,

block.text: Na sampela man i sanap na i sutim tok giaman long Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We heard him say, ‘I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and in three days I will build another made without hands.’”

block.text: "Mipela i harim em i tok olsem, 'Bai mi yet mi brukim dispela tempel ol man i bin wokim long han. Na bihain long tripela de bai mi sanapim narapela, tasol bai mi no wokim long han.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so, their testimony did not agree.

block.text: Tasol dispela tok ol i mekim, em tu i paul nabaut na i no wankain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus,

block.text: Orait hetpris i sanap long ai bilong ol kaunsil na em i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you no answer? What is it which these testify against you?”

block.text: "Yu no laik bekim wanpela tok, a? Olsem wanem long dispela tok ol i sutim long yu?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he stayed quiet, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i pasim maus na i no bekim wanpela tok long em. Orait hetpris i askim em gen,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?”

block.text: "Yu dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol man-meri bilong en? Yu Pikinini Bilong God Antap Tru, o nogat? "

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am. You will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of Power, and coming with the clouds of the sky.”

block.text: "Em mi tasol. Na bai yupela i lukim Pikinini Bilong Man i sindaun long han sut bilong God i gat bikpela strong. Na em bai i stap long ol klaut bilong heven na i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The high priest tore his clothes, and said,

block.text: Na hetpris i kirap nogut long dispela tok na i brukim klos bilong em yet na i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What further need have we of witnesses?
You have heard the blasphemy! What do you think?”

block.text: "Yumi no ken singautim sampela man moa bilong tokaut long pasin bilong dispela man. Nogat.
Yupela i harim pinis, em i tok bilas long God. Yupela i ting bai yumi mas mekim wanem long em?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all condemned him saying:

block.text: Na olgeta i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He deserves to die!”

block.text: "Em i gat rong, na em i mas i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to beat him with fists, and to tell him,

block.text: Orait nau sampela man ol i stat long spetim em. Na ol i pasim ai bilong en long laplap, na ol i paitim em, na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Prophesy!”

block.text: "Yu mekim tok profet nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The officers struck him with the palms of their hands.

block.text: Na ol plisman i kisim em na solapim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As Peter was in the courtyard below, one of the servants of the high priest came.

block.text: Pita i stap daunbilo, insait long banis bilong haus. Na wanpela wokmeri bilong hetpris i kam,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing Peter warming himself, she looked at him, and said,

block.text: na em i lukim Pita i hatim skin bilong en i stap. Na dispela wokmeri i lukluk stret long em, na i tok,

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “You were also with the Nazarene, Jesus!”

block.text: "Yu tu yu bin i stap wantaim Jisas bilong Nasaret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he denied it, saying,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok nogat olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I neither know, nor understand what you are saying.”

block.text: "Mi no save tru long dispela tok yu mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went out on the porch, and the rooster crowed.

block.text: Na em i go ausait klostu long dua bilong haus. Na wanpela kakaruk i krai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The servant girl saw him, and began again to tell those who stood by,

block.text: Na dispela wokmeri i lukim em gen, na em i tokim ol man i sanap klostu olsem,

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is one of them.”

block.text: "Dispela man hia em i man bilong lain bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But again Peter denied it, saying:

block.text: Tasol em i tok gen,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don't know him!”

block.text: "Nogat."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Again, after a little while, those who stood by said to Peter:

block.text: Bihain liklik, ol man i sanap i stap klostu ol i tok gen long Pita olsem,

block.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near
ReferenceBlocks.text: “You truly are one of them, for you are a Galilean, and your speech shows it.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, yu man bilong lain bilong ol. Yu man bilong Galili tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he began to curse, and to swear,

block.text: Orait nau Pita i tok strong tru olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I don't know this man of whom you speak!”

block.text: "Tru antap, mi no save long dispela man yupela i tok long en. Sapos mi no tok tru, orait God i ken bagarapim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The rooster crowed the second time. Peter remembered the word, how that Jesus said to him,

block.text: Em i tok pinis, na wantu kakaruk i krai namba 2 taim. Na Pita i tingim gen dispela tok Jisas i bin mekim long em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Before the rooster crows twice, you will deny me three times.”

block.text: "Taim kakaruk i no krai tupela taim yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he thought about that, he wept.

block.text: Na Pita i krai moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MARK CHP 15
Immediately in the morning the chief priests, with the elders and scribes, and the whole council, held a consultation, and bound Jesus, and carried him away, and delivered him up to Pilate.
Pilate asked him,

block.text: Long moningtaim tru ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman na ol saveman bilong lo na olgeta kaunsil ol i bung na toktok gut long samting ol i mas mekim. Na bihain ol i pasim Jisas long baklain, na ol i kisim em i go na putim em long han bilong Pailat.
Na Pailat i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: "Yu king bilong ol Juda, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes… It is as you say.”

block.text: "Yu yet yu tok olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests accused him of many things.
Pilate again asked him,

block.text: Ol bikpris i sutim planti tok long Jisas,
na Pailat i askim em gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you no answer? See how many things they testify against you!”

block.text: "Yu no laik bekim wanpela tok, a? Yu harim pinis dispela ol planti tok ol i sutim long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus made no further answer, so that Pilate marveled.

block.text: Tasol Jisas i no bekim wanpela tok moa, na dispela i mekim Pailat i tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now at the feast he used to release to them one prisoner, whom they asked of him.

block.text: Long olgeta yia long dispela bikpela de bilong lotu, Pailat i save lusim wanpela kalabusman. Ol manmeri yet i save kolim nem bilong wanpela man i stap long kalabus, na Pailat i save lusim dispela man i go long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was one called Barabbas, bound with those who had made insurrection, men who in the insurrection had committed murder.

block.text: Long dispela taim ol i bin kalabusim ol man i bin kirapim pait long gavman na kilim sampela man i dai. Wanpela man bilong dispela lain em man ol i kolim Barabas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude, crying aloud, said to Pilate:

block.text: Orait ol manmeri i kamap na ol i askim Pailat long

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do for us what you have always done for us in the past!”

block.text: mekim olsem bipo em i save mekim long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate answered them, saying,

block.text: Na Pailat i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you want me to release to you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: "Ating yupela i laik bai mi lusim dispela king bilong ol Juda i go long yupela?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he perceived that for envy the chief priests had delivered him up.

block.text: Pailat i tok olsem, long wanem, em i save, ol bikpris ol i bel nogut tasol long Jisas na ol i bringim em i kam long kot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the chief priests stirred up the people to yell:

block.text: Tasol ol bikpris i kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri, long ol i mas singaut long Pailat long em i no ken lusim Jisas. Em i mas

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give us Barrabus!”

block.text: lusim Barabas i kam long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate again asked them,

block.text: Na Pailat i askim ol gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then should I do to him whom you call the King of the Jews?”

block.text: "Na yupela i laik bai mi mekim wanem long dispela man, yupela i save kolim em king bilong ol Juda?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried out again,

block.text: Na ol i singaut gen olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him!”

block.text: "Nilim em long diwai kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to them,

block.text: Na Pailat i askim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why, what evil has he done?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem? Em i mekim wanem rong?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they cried out exceedingly,

block.text: Tasol ol i singaut strong moa,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him!”

block.text: "Nilim em long diwai kros."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate, wishing to please the multitude, released Barabbas to them, and handed over Jesus, when he had flogged him, to be crucified.

block.text: Na Pailat i laik mekim ol manmeri i amamas. Olsem na em i lusim Barabas i go long ol. Na em i tok na ol soldia i wipim Jisas. Na bihain em i givim Jisas long han bilong ol soldia, bai ol i nilim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The soldiers led him away within the court, which is the Praetorium; and they called together the whole cohort.

block.text: Ol soldia i bringim Jisas i go insait long banis bilong haus gavman, na ol i singautim olgeta soldia i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They clothed him with purple, and weaving a crown of thorns, they put it on him.

block.text: Ol i putim wanpela retpela klos long Jisas. Na ol i kisim ol rop i gat nil na wokim samting olsem hat bilong king, na ol i putim long het bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They began to salute him,

block.text: Na ol i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Hail, King of the Jews!”

block.text: "Gude, king bilong ol Juda!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They struck his head with a reed, and spat on him, and bowing their knees, did homage to him.

block.text: Na ol i kisim wanpela kanda na paitim het bilong en. Na ol i spet long em. Na ol i brukim skru na mekim ol pasin olsem ol i laik givim biknem long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had mocked him, they took the purple off of him, and put his own garments on him. They led him out to crucify him.

block.text: Ol i mekim dispela olgeta pasin bilong tok bilas long em pinis, orait ol i rausim retpela klos long em, na ol i putim bek klos bilong em yet. Na ol i kisim em i go bilong hangamapim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They compelled one passing by, coming from the country, Simon of Cyrene, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to go with them, that he might bear his cross.

block.text: Wanpela man, nem bilong en Saimon bilong taun Sairini, em i kam na i laik i go insait long taun. Saimon em i papa bilong Aleksander tupela Rufus. Na ol soldia i kisim em na mekim em i karim diwai kros bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They brought him to the place called Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, “The place of a skull.”

block.text: Ol i kisim Jisas i go long wanpela ples, nem bilong en Golgota. As bilong dispela nem i olsem, Ples bilong bun bilong het.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They offered him wine mixed with myrrh to drink, but he didn't take it.

block.text: Ol i laik givim Jisas sampela wain ol i bin tanim wantaim marasin. Tasol em i no dring.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Crucifying him, they parted his garments among them, casting lots on them, what each should take.

block.text: Orait ol soldia i hangamapim Jisas long diwai kros. Na ol i tilim ol klos samting bilong en long ol yet. Ol i pilai satu bilong makim husat bai i kisim wanem wanem samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was the third hour, and they crucified him.

block.text: Long 9 klok long moning taim, ol i hangamapim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The superscription of his accusation was written over him, “THE KING OF THE JEWS.”

block.text: Na long hap ol i save raitim tok ol i bin kotim man long en, ol i raitim tok olsem, "King bilong ol Juda. "

ReferenceBlocks.text: With him they crucified two robbers; one on his right hand, and one on his left.

block.text: With him they crucified two robbers; one on his right hand, and one on his left.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Scripture was fulfilled, which says,

block.text: The Scripture was fulfilled, which says,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He was numbered with transgressors.”
Those who passed by blasphemed him, wagging their heads, and saying,

block.text: Na ol manmeri i kam i go ol i tok bilas long em. Ol i naisim het na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Ha! You who destroy the temple, and build it in three days,
save yourself, and come down from the cross!”

block.text: "Goan, yu man bilong brukim tempel na wokim gen long tripela de tasol.
Nau yu ken helpim yu yet. Lusim diwai kros na kam daun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Likewise, also the chief priests mocking among themselves with the scribes said,

block.text: Ol bikpris wantaim ol saveman bilong lo, ol tu i tok bilas. Ol i tok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He saved others. He can't save himself.

block.text: "Em i bin helpim ol arapela man, tasol em i no inap helpim em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let the Christ, the King of Israel, now come down from the cross, that we may see and believe him.”

block.text: Dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, dispela king bilong Israel, em i ken lusim diwai kros na i kam daun, na bai yumi ken lukim, na yumi ken bilip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who were crucified with him insulted him.

block.text: Tupela man ol i bin hangamapim long ol diwai kros klostu long Jisas, tupela tu i mekim tok bilas long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the sixth hour had come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.

block.text: Long 12 klok, tudak i karamapim graun olgeta, i go inap long 3 klok long apinun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: At the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Na long 3 klok Jisas i singaut strong olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani?”

block.text: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: which is, being interpreted,

block.text: As bilong dispela tok i olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?”

block.text: "God bilong mi, God bilong mi, bilong wanem yu lusim mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of those who stood by, when they heard it, said,

block.text: Sampela man i sanap klostu, ol i harim dispela tok na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, he is calling Elijah.”

block.text: "Harim. Em i singautim Elaija."

ReferenceBlocks.text: One ran, and filling a sponge full of vinegar, put it on a reed, and gave it to him to drink, saying,

block.text: Na wanpela man i ran i go na i putim wanpela spans long wain. Na taim wain i pulap long en, em i pasim long wanpela stik na i givim long Jisas bilong dring. Na dispela man i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let him be. Let's see whether Elijah comes to take him down.”

block.text: "Wet, yumi lukim pastaim. Ating bai Elaija i kam kisim em i kam daun, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus cried out with a loud voice, and gave up the spirit.

block.text: Na Jisas i singaut strong moa, na em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The veil of the temple was torn in two from the top to the bottom.

block.text: Na dispela bikpela laplap i hangamap i stap insait long tempel em i bruk long antap i go inap long daunbilo bilong en, na i kamap tupela hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the centurion, who stood by opposite him, saw that he cried out like this and breathed his last, he said,

block.text: Na kepten bilong ol soldia em i sanap klostu long Jisas na em i lukim pasin Jisas i dai. Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Truly this man was the Son of God!”

block.text: "Tru tumas, dispela man em i Pikinini Bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were also women watching from afar, among whom were both Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome.

block.text: Sampela meri tu i sanap longwe liklik na ol i lukluk i stap. Wanpela namel long ol em Maria bilong taun Makdala. Na wanpela em Maria, mama bilong namba 2 Jems na bilong Josep. Na wanpela em Salome.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In Galilee, these women had followed him and served him. Many other women who came up with him to Jerusalem where there also.

block.text: Taim Jisas i bin i stap long Galili, ol dispela meri i bihainim em na helpim em. Na planti arapela meri tu i stap, ol i bin i go long Jerusalem wantaim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When evening had now come, because it was the Preparation Day, that is, the day before the Sabbath,
Joseph of Arimathaea, a prominent council member who also himself was looking for the Kingdom of God, came. He boldly went in to Pilate, and said:

block.text: Long apinun Josep bilong taun Arimatea em i kam. Em i wanpela bilong ol kaunsil, na em i gat gutpela nem long ai bilong ol manmeri. Em tu i save wet long lukim kingdom bilong God. Tumora de Sabat bai i kamap, na nau em i taim bilong redim ol samting bilong de Sabat. Orait Josep i go insait na i sanap long pes bilong Pailat, na em i no pret. Nogat. Em i askim Pailat long

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Give me the body of Jesus.”

block.text: larim em i kisim bodi bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate was surprised to hear that Jesus might already be dead, so he summoned the centurion he asked him:

block.text: Pailat i tingting planti, na i tok, "Em i dai pinis, a?" Na em i singautim kepten i kam, na i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Is he already dead?”

block.text: "Jisas i dai pinis, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The centurion said:

block.text: Pailat i harim pinis tok bilong kepten,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, he is dead.”
Then Pilate said to Joseph:

block.text: orait em i tokim Josep olsem em

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You may take his body.”

block.text: i ken kisim bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He bought a linen cloth, and taking him down, wound him in the linen cloth, and laid him in a tomb which had been cut out of a rock. He rolled a stone against the door of the tomb.

block.text: Orait Josep i go baim wanpela longpela waitpela laplap, na em i kisim bodi bilong Jisas i kam daun. Na em i karamapim em long waitpela laplap, na em i kisim bodi i go na i putim insait long wanpela matmat. Dispela matmat em wanpela hul bilong ston ol man i bin wokim. Na Josep i tantanim wanpela ston i kam pasim maus bilong hul.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary Magdalene and Mary, the mother of Joses, saw where he was laid.

block.text: Maria bilong Makdala wantaim Maria, mama bilong Josep, tupela i lukluk i stap, na tupela i lukim ples ol i putim Jisas long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: MARK CHP 16
When the Sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, bought spices, that they might come and anoint him.

block.text: De Sabat i pinis, na Maria bilong Makdala wantaim Maria, mama bilong Jems, na Salome, ol i baim wel na ol arapela samting i gat gutpela smel. Ol i laik i go welim bodi bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Very early on the first day of the week, they came to the tomb when the sun had risen.

block.text: Long moningtaim tru long namba wan de bilong wik, ol i go long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were saying among themselves,

block.text: Na ol i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who will roll away the stone from the door of the tomb for us?”

block.text: "Husat bai i helpim yumi long tantanim dispela ston na rausim long maus bilong matmat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: for it was very big. Looking up, they saw that the stone was rolled back.

block.text: Tasol taim ol i kam klostu, ol i lukluk i go, na ol i lukim ston i no i stap moa long maus bilong matmat. Nogat. Ol i bin tantanim dispela ston i go pinis. Dispela ston em i traipela ston tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Entering into the tomb, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, dressed in a white robe, and they were amazed.
He said to them,

block.text: Orait ol i go insait long matmat, na ol i lukim wanpela yangpela man i sindaun i stap long han sut. Em i gat longpela waitpela klos. Na ol i kirap nogut long lukim dispela man.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don't be alarmed. You seek Jesus, the Nazarene, who has been crucified. He has risen. He is not here. Behold, the place where they laid him!

block.text: "Yupela i no ken kirap nogut. Mi save, yupela i kam bilong painim Jisas bilong Nasaret, em ol i bin hangamapim long diwai kros. Em i kirap pinis. Em i no i stap hia. Lukim dispela ples ol i bin putim em long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But go, tell his disciples and Peter, ‘He goes before you into Galilee. There you will see him, as he said to you.’”

block.text: Tasol yupela i mas i go givim dispela tok long ol disaipel bilong en, na long Pita tu, 'Jisas em i go paslain long yupela long Galili. Yupela bai i lukim em long Galili, olsem bipo em i tokim yupela pinis.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went out, and fled from the tomb, for trembling and astonishment had come on them. They said nothing to anyone; for they were afraid.

block.text: Orait ol meri i go ausait, na ol i lusim matmat na i ranawe. Bel bilong ol i kirap nogut na ol i wok long guria. Na ol i no mekim wanpela tok long wanpela man, long wanem, ol i pret. Maria bilong Makdala i lukim Jisas

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when he had risen early on the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had cast out seven demons.

block.text: Jisas i kirap long moningtaim tru long namba wan de bilong wik. Na em i kamap pastaim long Maria bilong Makdala. Em dispela meri bipo Jisas i bin rausim 7 -pela spirit nogut long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She went and told those who had been with him, as they mourned and wept.

block.text: Maria em i go tokim ol man i bin wokabaut wantaim Jisas. Dispela ol man ol i bel hevi na ol i krai i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they heard that he was alive, and had been seen by her, they disbelieved.

block.text: Maria i tokim ol olsem, "Jisas em i stap laip na mi lukim em pinis." Ol i harim dispela tok, tasol ol i no bilipim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things he was revealed in another form to two of them, as they walked, on their way into the country.

block.text: Na bihain tupela disaipel i lusim taun na i wokabaut i go. Na Jisas i kamap narakain na i go kamap long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went away and told it to the rest. They didn't believe them, either.

block.text: Na tupela i go autim dispela tok long ol arapela disaipel. Tasol ol i no bilipim tok bilong tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Afterward he appeared to the eleven as they sat at the table, and he rebuked them saying:

block.text: Bihain ol 11 -pela disaipel i sindaun na kaikai i stap, na Jisas i kamap long ol. Em i krosim ol long ol

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Your hearts are hard! Why did you not believe the others who had seen me?”

block.text: i no gat bilip, na bel bilong ol i pas, na ol i no bilipim tok bilong ol manmeri i lukim em i kirap bek pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go into all the world, and preach the Good News to the whole creation.

block.text: "Yupela i mas i go long olgeta hap bilong graun na autim gutnius long olgeta man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who believes and is baptized will be saved; but he who disbelieves will be condemned.

block.text: Man i bilip na i kisim baptais, God bai i kisim bek em. Tasol man i no bilip, em bai i lus long kot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These signs will accompany those who believe: in my name they will cast out demons; they will speak with new languages;

block.text: God bai i wokim ol mirakel long han bilong ol man i bilip. Long nem bilong mi ol bai i rausim ol spirit nogut, na ol bai i autim ol nupela kain tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: they will take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it will in no way hurt them; they will lay hands on the sick, and they will recover.”

block.text: Ol bai i holim snek long han. Na sapos ol i dringim samting i save kilim man, dispela samting bai i no inap bagarapim ol. Na ol bai i putim han long ol sikman, na ol sikman bai i orait gen."

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then the Lord, after he had spoken to them, was received up into heaven, and sat down at the right hand of God.

block.text: Bikpela Jisas em i autim tok long ol pinis, na God i kisim em i go long heven. Na em i sindaun long han sut bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went out, and preached everywhere, the Lord working with them, and confirming the word by the signs that followed. Amen.

block.text: Na ol disaipel i go, na ol i autim tok long olgeta hap. Na Bikpela i wok wantaim ol, na em i mekim ol mirakel i kamap bilong strongim tok bilong ol.
